description: This file defines an API route for user authentication, specifically for obtaining access tokens via login using OAuth2 password flow. It uses FastAPI to create a POST endpoint at /token, validating user credentials against a database and generating a JWT token upon success.

methods.name: login_for_access_token( form_data: OAuth2PasswordRequestForm = Depends(), db: Session = Depends(get_db) )
methods.description: Handles user login, verifies credentials, and issues an access token if authentication is successful.

ctags.name: login_for_access_token
ctags.signature: ( form_data: OAuth2PasswordRequestForm = Depends(), db: Session = Depends(get_db) )
